title: Spline Modeling - Over the Garden Wall
content:
I was excited with the new software called Spline.Tool
This software is kinda unique and different with the other 3d software. Why?
It's because the software is designed for web and mobile application.
Of course, it's also realtime! So, you're able to have a new experiene to play with your 3D with music and movement.

https://my.spline.design/overthegardenwallgreg3d-7c32d69166fe915451e406364d8de848/

That time, I was joined the small competition from Spline community.
There are no prize for the competition, but I did this as a motivation for myself and I'm quite happy with the result.
Not win as the 1st winner, but I was chosen as a best cartoon character ⭐🐸
